title: Client and Honor suggestions
body:
A lower-spec mode for the client would be welcome for those who have problems with fps when keeping it on in-game, and:

I was thinking two honor opportunities would be a great compromise between the current and old system: an all-round honor giving system for everyone in the game (perhaps allowing 'honorable opponents' to return)*, and an MVP honor screen for that weighty honor-bestowing decision that improves the system so. This way, the positive reinforcement of good behavior in-game should be stronger.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

* simply allowing the thumb icons in the end-game lobby to work again would allow for the older, broader system to continue to contribute; 
* enabling honor crests more often would also be a desirable!

Hope this was helpful to anyhwone at Riot!
